title: JBL Xtreme 2 Rugged/Waterproof Bluetooth Wireless Speaker - Black
description: Unleash powerful and crystal clear audio when you play music through the JBL Xtreme 2 wireless speaker. The speaker is designed to provide immersive stereo-quality sound for up to 15 hours with the included rechargeable ion battery. The rugged, waterproof design makes the speaker perfect for all outings.
